abstract: Music industry's global trade group, International Federation of the Phonographic Industry, determines Fridays as official release day for new albums worldwide; says move will reduce piracy and align listeners.
lead_paragraph: To help combat online piracy, the music industry’s global trade group has decided on Fridays as the official day to make new albums available.

headline.main: Global Deal to Release New Albums on Fridays
headline.print_headline: Global Deal to Release New Albums on Fridays

snippet: To help combat online piracy, the music industry’s global trade group has decided on Fridays as the official day to make new albums available.

keywords.value: International Federation of the Phonographic Industry
